select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.software_name , t1.software_basic_name , t1.software_id , t1.software_code , t1.software_version , t1.software_release_num , t1.software_period , t1.software_code_size , t1.software_leader , t1.software_language , t1.software_run_environment , t1.software_dev_environment , t1.remarks , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 from assets_tdevice_software t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')

and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.SOFTWARE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.softwareName}),'%')
and t1.SOFTWARE_BASIC_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.softwareBasicName}),'%')

and t1.SOFTWARE_RUN_ENVIRONMENT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.softwareRunEnvironment}),'%')
and t1.SOFTWARE_DEV_ENVIRONMENT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.softwareDevEnvironment}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
